title: PBE
body: I applied for the PBE a long time ago but now I have realized that I didn't actually put in any information when I did. Is there a way to redo this? because every time I retry it says that my application has already been sent.

replies.body:
When you apply for PBE, you simply click a button to apply and that's it. The system uses the information already on your current account when you apply. For complete information on the PBE, [check out our FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top)

Let me know if you have any questions.
